name: Micro-VO2 #2
description:
Micro intervals are a staple workout for many athletes. Despite being comprised of multiple, short, high-intensity efforts, micro intervals are an effective method to target VO2max development. There is an infinite amount of variations possible with micro intervals. 



In today's session, we perform 30/15's?30sec hard, followed by 15sec recovery.
